short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Countdown and Session Timer for browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Countdown to events like 
• Tasks📚💻
• Travel date 🛫🌏🌞
• Events 🎸💃🏆
• Classes 📚👨‍🎓✍
• Appointments 🧐🐕💻
• Birthdays 🎁🥳🎊
• Holidays  ✨🎁🍴

Benefits of countdown for your events
•  Better mood and more excitement.
•  Clarity and perspective
•  Helps with anticipation of event

Benefits of session timer
• Attention and concentration are improved.
• Better time-management abilities.
• Increased productivity and motivation.

Countdown and session banner sits at the top of your page. Customize your banner to fit your events and sessions with different colors and fonts.

Session timer is a great tool to increase your focus and productivity. You can use it for study, work or any type of session⌚⏳
